name: SuperHero Car Stunt Race City
description:
SuperHero Car Stunt Race City and just have to increase the high speed on the accelerometer to perform the best risky stunts in SuperHero Car Stunt Race City. You can control best with your moving accelerator and speed up on SuperHero Car Stunt Race City.
Get this superhero mega ramp car stunts racing stunt master game. Play super car stunt games & get checkpoints, when you failed, you can restart superhero stunt racing car games 2021. So beware of hurdles and play superhero car stunts games 2021

CHALLENGES
We've designed the most challenging and fun races for you to drive. Jump over dangerous ramps and beat the challenges.
FEATURE
- High-speed vehicle
- Realistic environment
- Amazing sounds and 3D Graphics
- Boost up your level
- Multiple camera views
- Unique stunts
